page.title: 14BOY FROM NEW TOWN/LEISURE
page.content: { DURING THE HOLIDAYS}THIS YOUNG BOY } GOES CANOEING AT A LOCAL CLUB. HE ALSO PLAYS BADMINTON AT THE LOCAL SPORTS CENTRE. IN LATE AUGUST HE USUALLY GOES ABROAD WITH HIS FAMILY AT OTHER TIMES DURING THE HOLIDAYS HE AND HIS FAMILY VISIT PLYMOUTH WHERE THEY USED TO LIVE. { AFTER SCHOOL LEISURE TIME AFTER SCHOOL HE GOES TO A LOCAL PLAYING FIELD TO PLAY FOOTBALL OR CRICKET WITH HIS FRIENDS. AFTER HIS TEA HE DOES HIS HOMEWORK FOR AN HOUR THEN HE WATCHES TELEVISION UNTIL 9.00 THEN HE GOES TO BED AND READS FOR 45 MINUTES.
